banner.title: Technology for Business
banner.subtitle: EMPOWERING DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION
banner.description:
At SMEW Tech, we are not just developers—we are business solution architects. We believe technology is most powerful when it solves real problems, creates competitive advantages, and drives sustainable growth. Every line of code we write, every solution we build is aimed at one goal: Your business success.
Speed, Scale, Global Presence, Quality and Compliance.

about.title: Building the Digital Future
about.subtitle: About us
about.missionText: We are committed to providing advanced, flexible, and efficient technology solutions that help clients optimize operations, enhance competitive capabilities, and achieve exceptional growth in the digital era.
about.visionText: By 2030, SMEW Tech aims to become one of the leading technology companies in the region, a symbol of innovation, creativity, and quality, bringing Vietnam's technology products to the world stage.
about.description: With over 10 years of experience in the global market, SMEW Technology has empowered digital transformation for businesses worldwide across various industries: Healthcare, BFSI, Communications, Media and Services, Logistics and Transportation, Consumer Packaged Goods, Public Sector, and Blockchain.

services.title: Comprehensive Technology Solutions
services.subtitle: Our Services
services.description: Strategic solutions tailored to overcome any business IT challenge and drive sustainable growth. We don't just provide services—we architect business solutions.

odc.title: Strategic Development Center (ODC)
odc.description: Not just outsourcing—strategic team expansion with 35%-60% cost savings. Dedicated, culturally aligned teams integrated into your core processes.
odc.listItem: Strategic Development Center (ODC) - Not just outsourcing, but strategic team expansion

mobile.title: MOBILE APP DEVELOPMENT
mobile.description: Building apps that are not just beautiful but optimized for conversion rates and enhanced user engagement. iOS, Android, Flutter, React Native.
mobile.listItem: Mobile App Development - Beautiful interfaces optimized for conversion

web.title: WEB DEVELOPMENT
web.description: Building powerful, scalable web platforms that operate efficiently, reduce costs, and are ready for future growth. E-learning, e-commerce, Fintech, Web3.
web.listItem: Web Development - Powerful platforms built to scale

dataLabeling.title: DATA LABELING
dataLabeling.description: Providing highly accurate input data as a solid foundation for your AI models to make smarter, more effective business decisions. Data annotation, HITL, Computer Vision.
dataLabeling.listItem: Data Labeling - Precise data for intelligent AI decisions

values.title: Our Philosophy: Technology for Business
values.subtitle: OUR CORE VALUES IN ACTION
values.description: Living our philosophy of Technology for Business

innovation.title: Innovation Focused on Effectiveness
innovation.description: We apply new technologies not to follow trends, but to find the most effective solutions to your business challenges.

quality.title: Quality for Business Goals
quality.description: Quality products are not just bug-free—they must be stable, secure, and directly contribute to your revenue and cost objectives.

customer.title: Customer-Centric Strategy
customer.description: We listen to understand, consult to optimize, and partner as an integral part of your company.

transparency.title: Transparency in All Processes
transparency.description: You will always know where your project stands, what the progress is, and every decision is discussed openly.

collaboration.title: Collaboration to Create Value
collaboration.description: We work closely with clients because we believe the best solutions come from collective strength.

projects.title: Proof of Capability Through Real Projects
projects.subtitle: RECENT PROJECTS
projects.description: With over 500 completed projects for more than 200 clients, SMEW Tech is confident in transforming ideas into reality. Here are select projects we've developed, authorized by our customers to be publicly displayed.
projects.successStoriesDescription: Going deeper into specific projects to show how SMEW Tech solves problems and creates real value for clients.

case1.title: Project 1: Xtatuz - Hotel Booking App in Thailand
case1.challengeText: Building a competitive, user-friendly booking platform for the vibrant tourism market.
case1.solutionText: SMEW Tech developed a cross-platform mobile application with an intuitive interface, intelligent search and payment system, integrated maps, and user reviews.
case1.resultsText: Helped Xtatuz attract thousands of users in a short time, grew revenue, and received positive feedback on the app experience.

case2.title: Project 2: Position Exchange - Web3 Decentralized Exchange
case2.challengeText: Building a secure, transparent, and high-performance trading platform on blockchain.
case2.solutionText: Our team deployed complex smart contracts, integrated digital wallets, and optimized trading protocols to minimize gas costs.
case2.resultsText: The platform processes millions of USD in daily trading volume, confirming SMEW Tech's deep expertise in Web3 and Blockchain.

technology.title: Technologies We Use
technology.subtitle: Technology Platform
technology.description: We constantly update and apply the most powerful technologies to create optimal solutions.
technology.languagesContent: JavaScript, Python, Java, Golang, Rust, PHP, Swift, Kotlin, TypeScript
technology.frameworksBackendContent: Node.js, Django, Laravel, Spring Boot, Go
technology.cloudContent: AWS, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Microsoft Azure

workflow.title: Optimized Project Implementation Process
workflow.subtitle: Our Professional Workflow
workflow.description: We believe a clear workflow is the key to success. At SMEW Tech, we apply a 6-phase working model.
workflow.discoveryDescription: Listen, clarify ideas, goals, and project requirements. Research market and competitors.
workflow.designDescription: Build wireframes and prototypes. Design modern, user-friendly interfaces optimized for user experience.
workflow.developmentDescription: Engineering team programs features. Apply Agile/Scrum methodology to ensure timeline.
workflow.testingDescription: Comprehensive testing across multiple devices and scenarios to detect and fix bugs, ensuring stable product operation.
workflow.deploymentDescription: Deploy product to production environment. Handover source code and detailed documentation.
workflow.maintenanceDescription: Monitor and ensure system operates stably post-launch. Provide technical support and upgrade packages.

whyChoose.title: Your Technology Partner for Sustainable Growth
whyChoose.subtitle: Why Choose SMEW Tech
whyChoose.description: We are more than a service provider—we are your dedicated partner, committed to listening, supporting, and helping you achieve your goals.

experience.title: International Experience
experience.description: Over 10 years working with global partners, deeply understanding different markets and industries.

qualityAssurance.title: Top Quality
qualityAssurance.description: Rigorous quality management processes at every project stage ensure the highest standards.

testimonials.subtitle: TESTIMONIALS
testimonials.title: What Our Customers Have To Say

testimonial1.text: We collaborated with SMEW Technology to build a software system for managing course and affiliate sales on TikTok. They delivered a product that exceeded our expectations. The user-friendly interface and powerful functionalities have helped us manage courses and sales more effectively. We are highly satisfied with the professionalism and dedication of the SMEW Technology team.
testimonial1.name: Mr.Linh

testimonial2.text: SMEW Technology worked with us to develop a hotel booking application system for Thailand. They demonstrated an in-depth understanding of our requirements and provided optimal solutions. The result is a beautiful and easy-to-use hotel booking app with many useful features. We highly appreciate the professionalism and commitment of the SMEW Technology team.
testimonial2.name: Mr.Hoa

testimonial3.text: SMEW Technology performed exceptionally in building the Live stream app and find friends system in Japan. They fully met our complex requirements and delivered an outstanding product. We are highly satisfied with the performance and features of the application and thank the SMEW Technology team for their enthusiastic support.
testimonial3.name: Yuusuke akinaga

testimonial4.text: SMEW Technology provided us with an excellent solution for the decentralized exchange crypto and Blockchain layer 1 software system. They demonstrated high expertise and innovation in building this product. Modern technology and superior security have enabled us to perform transactions safely and efficiently. We are highly satisfied with the results and commendable collaboration with SMEW Technology.
testimonial4.name: Mr.Quy

testimonial5.text: SMEW Technology delivered a fantastic internal Chat application solution for us. The system has improved internal communication efficiency in our company. The user-friendly interface and flexible features have created a conducive environment for exchanging information and ideas. We highly value the SMEW Technology team for their enthusiasm and professionalism in providing a solution for us.
testimonial5.name: Aqeel Abbas Khan
